reqs:
Pre-reqs: WOOD 356.
Lectures will be held in the CAWP Caseroom (FSC 2916).
Labs will be held in CAWP Machine Lab.
courseName: Principles of Wood Cutting and Tooling
description: Wood cutting fundamentals, chip formation, cutting conditions, cutting edge maintenance, sawing, planing and molding, veneer cutting, chipping, turning.
